task 1.description: Design and develop frontend UI for the real estate listing platform, including property listings, search and filter functionality, user authentication, user profiles, and messaging system.
potential_issues: Compatibility issues across multiple devices and browsers

task 2.description: Develop backend and database to store property listings, user profiles, and appointment details, including data import/export functionalities and REST APIs for accessing and updating data.

task 3.description: Build an appointment scheduling system with calendar integration, appointment management for agents, and automated reminders for users.
potential_issues: Integration with existing backend and frontend systems
